amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: If an award recipient discontinues attendance before the end of the award year, the award recipient shall remit any award balance allowable to the eligible postsecondary educational institution in accordance with such institution's withdrawal policy. The institution shall remit such award balance to the commission in accordance with such institution's refund policy.
